self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Bowel Control Scale Test Name Terminology

name: Bowel Control Scale Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Bowel Control Scale Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Bowel Control Scale Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you almost lost control of your bowels or almost had an accident?
terms.preferredTerm: BWCS - Almost Lost Control of Your Bowels

terms.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you altered your activities because of bowel control problems?
terms.preferredTerm: BWCS - Altered Activities Because Bowel Control Problems

terms.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you been constipated?
Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how much have bowel problems restricted your overall lifestyle?
terms.preferredTerm: BWCS - Bowel Problems Restrict Overall Lifestyle

terms.definition: Bowel Control Scale - During the past 4 weeks, how often have you lost control of your bowels or had an accident?
terms.preferredTerm: BWCS - Lost Control of Your Bowels
